mapper.insert: insert INTO gonggo (user_no , title, role, work_hours, wage, working_start_date,working_end_date , state, com_area, tel) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{role}, #{workHours}, #{wage}, #{workingStartDate},#{workingEndDate}, true, #{comArea}, #{tel})
mapper.update: update gonggo set title = #{title} , role = #{role}, work_hours = #{workHours} , wage = #{wage} , working_start_date = #{workingStartDate} , working_end_date = #{workingEndDate} , state = true, com_area = #{comArea} , tel = #{tel} where gonggo_no = #{gonggoNo}
